name: d3-gridding
description: creates various grid partitions and overlays for d3 charts

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-gridding.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-gridding.js -c -m -o build/d3-gridding.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-gridding.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-gridding.js build/d3-gridding.min.js
